message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the product price down to $120?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've already invested a lot in this product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $135 is closer to my budget, I still hope to find a price that suits both of us. Could we possibly agree on $120 for the product?
